response.explain: The previous action code successfully registered the fridge and opened it. The next step is to take out the hot dogs from the fridge.
response.subtask:
(1) Register all the objects
(2) Open the fridge
(3) Take out the hot dogs from the fridge
(4) Cook the hot dogs
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 3: Take out the hot dogs from the fridge
    hotdog_87 = registry(env, "hotdog_87")
    hotdog_86 = registry(env, "hotdog_86")
    EasyGrasp(robot, hotdog_87)
    donothing(env)
    EasyGrasp(robot, hotdog_86)
    donothing(env)
